titleStmt.title: A defence of Nicholas Smith against a reply to his discussion of some pointes taught by Mr. Doctour Kellison in his Treatise of the ecclesiasticall hierarchy. By A.B.
titleStmt.author: A. B.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by STC to M. Wilson.
